duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervises all trades and vendors: with PM schedules trade work in field, and follow up correspondence to provide clear start time, scope, coordination, and duration
Maintains quality control on all aspects of construction
Schedules inspections and maintains electronic logs
Collects, manages, and issues shop drawings, SKs, and specs
Confirms % complete with PM on sub billing
Maintains drawings, produces field Sketches as needed, and SK log in the field
Takes and manages field photos works with APM for weekly report
Alerts PM to trade issues and sub scheduling problems (i.e., No shows)
Orders tools & obtains construction materials for the project
Maintains job site safety, quality control and standardized construction procedures.
Organizes project paperwork, inspects adjacent apartments to work site and sets up reference lines and a benchmark.
Submits weekly time sheets for site crew.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Civil Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
